author: Mark Lunney
comment: Love having all my loyalty cards in one place. Getting better as more of my favourite restaurants are being added.

author: Gareth Hobby
comment: Excellent app. No issues discovered so far. Intuitive interface.

author: Luther Mensah
comment: Finger print unlock doesn't appear anymore

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hello Luther, we're sorry to hear that. To set the fingerprint passcode you must first make sure it's enabled on your phone. After that please go to your profile settings and select "Passcode." You should be able to set a fingerprint passcode there. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out at support@yoyowallet.com

author: Jemma C
comment: I keep getting an error when I go to update the app. I use it in college. This is quite irritating

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hello Jemma, we're really sorry to hear that! Could you please send an email describing the details of the error to support@yoyowallet.com so we can look into this for you further? Thank you very much, the Yoyo Wallet team

author: angela mckellop
comment: I cannot get this to work.  Get message    java.security cert  certpath validation exception   Trust anchor for certification path not found

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hello Angela, I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your app. This looks like a connection problem - if you are connected to a Wifi, please turn your Wifi off and try to log in while your phone is on a 4G connection. If that will not work, please reach out to me on support@yoyowallet.com and I will be happy to investigate this further.

author: Manuel Alveirinho
comment: Amazing way to pay

author: Stephen O'Shea
comment: Very good app. Useful for paying via card, with the added bonus of getting points and vouchers.

The app has never failed me at checkout. Usually easier then using another payment service like Android Pay. The rewards are also nice to have considering I am just buying what I would normally buy on Android Pay with no reward.  The User Interface is also really easy to use and understand though sometimes the amount reward points I have can disappear for a little while but this only happens once a month or so and has never been much of an issue.  The only downside to YoYo is that not many company's support the service compared to Android Pay but its not much of a hassle having both app's installed. Other then that I cant complain and love the app!

author: Sam Patten
comment: Easy to use, great app to have!

author: Lucy Evans
comment: Great Customer Service when something went wrong
Stamps never collected, points disappear. It just doesn't work.

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hello - oh no, that's no good! Please note that stamps are only awarded against qualifying purchases and that points are accrued after each transaction. Also the loyalty that is earned is yours and does not disappear unless you use it to claim a voucher. Please contact us at support@yoyowallet.com so we can have a look for you into this.

author: Chris Piesina
comment: Love the fact I can pay so quickly and efficiently

author: Tom Cox
comment: Great being able to pay for stuff in places which only accept cash. Also good to be able to o export receipts as pdf CSV etc. Need to fix this in Orio though as my Nexus5x isn't working with it now 😥

author: Daniel Andrews
comment: Great for loyalty schemes. But the new interface design is shockingly bad. Really, really bad.

author: ColinJPZ
comment: Just installed this app and used it once, so I'm not too sure how valid my comments are. So far, I like the ease of setup, ease of use, and the fact that it provides rewards.

author: Murat Islam
comment: It works well at my workplace canteen.  Although it says 20% coffee cake discount offer is valid between 2pm-3pm when the canteen is not actually open.  I wish I could also use it to pay bus fares for Stagecoach or First in the UK..

author: Dan Braden
comment: YOYO is the best, i YOYO every day and i love it

author: Spike Robinson
comment: Fine until you want to add/update your card details. Then the work flow is terrible, much worse than similar apps.

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hi Spike. Thanks for taking the time to write a review. We'd love to hear more about this to see what we can do to improve the Yoyo experience for you. Would you mind writing an email to toby@yoyowallet.com please? Yours, the Yoyo Team

author: Matt Cresswell
comment: Great app, great design, super quick and easy to use. Love it.

author: Nairn Campbell
comment: From a functional perspective, this app performs well. Never had an issue with it working when I've used it. However I really hate using app because of the obnoxious hot pink background, and the fact that it turns my brightness to full when it's open. This is a genuinely disgusting combination that makes me want to just pay with cash instead.

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hi Nairn. We hope you're enjoying the new version of Yoyo - hopefully it isn't too obnoxiously pink now🙈 ! The reason for the brightness going to full is so that we can ensure the QR code is always scanned - it now should only brighten when you hit the pay button. If you have any more feedback, we'd love to hear from you at support@yoyowallet.com

author: Steve Myatt
comment: It's so quick and convenient to use, always have phone handier than wallet and/or fumbling about with small change. I love having itemised VAT receipts and loyalty cards digitally. What's not to like?

author: Faye Rowley
comment: Fast and easy to use

author: Richard Hales
comment: It would be useful to be able to gift my vouchers to someone else.

author: Bilal Ahmad
comment: Easy, secure, and quick!

author: Tom Lindeboom
comment: Simple, safe and fast payment method.

author: Sam Osborne
comment: poor very poor

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hello Sam -we're sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with the app. Could you please contact us at support@yoyowallet.com, we would love to hear your thoughts. All feedback is taken onboard so don't hesitate to reach out! Thanks - Your Yoyo Team.

comment: Getting better

author: Gary Young
comment: It's simple and easy to use.

author: Sarah Hatfield
comment: A conveniet way to pay

author: Anna Sofia Tascini
comment: I love it! Very practical and useful in the everyday life in Imperial College. I love the rewards (they are getting better and better with time!) and the possibility to just pay with the phone.

author: Phil Wilson
comment: Nice and easy method to  pay without the need to carry credit cards.

author: Michael Dunphy
comment: Fingerprint makes the app crash. Need to enter password each time
Good but would be better with notifications on when you use the app

author: Emily O' Donovan
comment: Bugs were fixed :)

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hi Emily! Oh no, that's no good! We have our finest men working on this issue and it’s only affecting certain devices. Don't worry they will have no rest until this is fixed.

author: Josh Twigg
comment: Some of the offers have been removed and the value of the points has been reduced :(

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Hi Josh, sorry we make you cringe. Release notes guy paid an homage to you in the last release notes 😛! What would you like to improve about the pin lock? Email us at support@yoyowallet.com - we'd love to hear from you.

author: Paula Nelson
comment: Easy to use

author: STEVEN PARTRIDGE
comment: Works great

author: Nick L
comment: Only managed to launch it one time. Then no longer working, have to clear data and resigning in again on every use. Painful.

reply.author: Yoyo Wallet Limited
reply.content: Oh no! We're sorry to hear that. Why don't you ping us an email to support@yoyowallet.com so we can have a look into this issue? Thanks!

author: Mustan Bharmal
comment: Really badly designed app. Each update means it stops tracking / updating my points & stamp cards etc. I have to uninstall and reinstall this app every time. Not good.

author: Raymond Onwunali
comment: It just works, I'd like to see multiple cards and maybe nfc integration. The Fingerprint security is nice too.
